songs.title: Dirty Face
songs.lyrics:
Show me your dirty face

[Hook]
Show me your dirty face
Show me your dirty face
Show me your dirty face
Put away that butterz one

[Verse 1]
Smile all you want, you can try your luck
You won't get a drink cause I'm tight as fuck
There's only one way that you might get a taste
Girl, put on your dirty face
Carry you away like a suitcase, girl
Why you looking at me with a screw face? Well
There's only one way you can see my place
Girl, put on your dirty face

[Hook x2]

[Verse 2]
I don't wanna see classy, show me you're nasty
Do it with your eyes and your lips as you walk right past me
If I like then I might ask you
Alright, there's no need to ask me
Flirtily, dirtily, look at me
Like you wanna hurt me, you heard me?
And certainly lift up your skirty
Show me the lace, show me your dirty face

[Hook]

[Link]
Show me your dirty face
Show me your dirty face
Show me your dirty face

[Bridge x2]
Put away the butterz one
Put away the butterz one
Put away the butterz one
Cause your face looks darsh

[Link]

[Bridge]

Put away that butterz one

[Verse 1]

[Hook]
